com.jidesoft.grid
Interface Node

All Known Subinterfaces:
Expandable, ExpandableCell, ExpandableRow, GanttEntry<T>, GroupRow, MutableGanttEntry<T>, ReferenceRow, Row, SubEntryGanttEntry<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractExpandable, AbstractExpandableRow, AbstractGroupRow, AbstractNode, AbstractRow, BeanProperty, ChildBeanProperty, DefaultExpandable, DefaultExpandableRow, DefaultExpandableValue, DefaultGanttEntry, DefaultGroupRow, DefaultProperty, DummyValue, GrandTotalValue, IndexReferenceRow, Property, RootExpandableRow, RunningSummaryValue, SummaryValue
public interface Node

An interface to indicate an object that can have parent in a tree-like data structure.

Method Summary
 int getLevel()
          Gets the number of level counting from the first level.
 Node getNextSibling()
          Gets next sibling of current node.

          Gets the parent of this expandable.

          Gets previous sibling of current node.

          Sets the parent of this expandable.
 

Method Detail

getLevel

int getLevel()
Gets the number of level counting from the first level. If the expandable doesn't have any parent, the level will be 0.

Returns:
the number of level above
